statements: UPDATE customers SET email_address='john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;

UPDATE customers
SET customer_name = 'John Doe',
    email_address = 'john.doe@example.com'
WHERE customer_id = 1;

UPDATE backups
SET backup_location = '/var/backups/',
    backup_size = backup_size + 1000
WHERE backup_id = 3;
